p: Many studies carried out to prove the biological activities of this species are limited in studies with crude extracts, mostly ethanolic extracts. Little is known about the biological activities that the essential oils of T. diversifolia can provide for the treatment of different diseases described by ethnopharmacology [ 8] such as constipation, stomach pains, indigestion, sore throat, liver pain, menstrual pain [ 9], anti-inflammatory activities [ 10], anticancer activity [ 11], anti-amoebic [ 12], antiviral and activity against the human immunodeficiency virus [ 13].
